channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg
channel.description:
http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-74-nobody-ever-got-fired-for-hiring-vector-media-group-with-special-guest-matt-weinberg/
We’re joined by our friend Matt Weinberg to chat about growing a large consultancy, software, hiring, and more. A lot of great insights in this one, don’t miss it!
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. [Sign up today and get $20 off](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016).

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
Salman:

What do you mean hearing his stories reminded you of why you sold out? You hated running one?

I listened to the podcast months ago, so I don’t remember exactly. I didn’t enjoy the stress of running a consultancy with a team dependent on me continually winning new client projects.

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg
item.dc:creator: mattweinberg
item.description:
Thanks so much for the kind words, @JohnH and @SteveMcLeod! It was a lot of fun. Feel free to reach out if I can ever be helpful in any way. I’m mrw on Twitter and my email is matt@vectormediagroup.com.

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg
item.dc:creator: SteveMcLeod
item.description:
I especially liked this episode. Hearing Matt’s stories reminds me why I sold out of my own software consultancy in 2003!

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped, Episode 74, “Nobody ever got fired for hiring Vector Media Group” with special guest Matt Weinberg
